title: Remove static generation and update deployment
description: Remove Next.js static generation features and update to client-side only rendering. Update GitHub Pages deployment configuration. Remove build-time data fetching. Ensure all functionality works in browser-only environment.

comments.text: Starting work on removing static generation from the web dashboard.
Removed Next.js API route and updated task page to use GitHub API directly.
Updated deployment to rely solely on client-side rendering.
